```{r}

data_lock <- read_csv("G:/ZPID lockdown measures dataset 4.0.csv")




```

```{r}

data_lock <- data_lock %>%mutate(stateID_new=case_when(
                                                   (stateID == 1) ~ 8,#bwu
                                                   (stateID == 2) ~ 9,#bayern
                                                  (stateID == 3) ~ 11,#berl
                                                    (stateID == 4) ~ 12,#branden
                                                  (stateID == 5) ~ 4,#bremen
                                                    (stateID == 6) ~ 2,#hamburg
                                                   (stateID == 7) ~ 6,#hess
                                                        (stateID == 8) ~ 13,#MV
                                                   (stateID == 9) ~ 3,#nieder
                                                    (stateID == 10) ~ 5,#nrw
                                                   (stateID == 11) ~ 7,#rheinland
                                                   (stateID == 12) ~ 10,#saarland
                                                   (stateID == 13) ~ 14,#sachsen
                                                   (stateID == 14) ~ 15,#SachsenAnhal
                                                     (stateID == 15) ~ 1,#schleswig
                                                   (stateID == 16) ~ 16)) #thü

stay_at_home<-data_lock%>%filter(str_detect(Measure,"leavehome"))%>%select(stateID_new,'2020-03-08':'2020-07-04')%>%mutate(measure_type="2")

neu<-data_lock %>%
   group_by(stateID_new)%>%
  summarize_at(vars('2020-03-08':'2020-07-04'), sum)%>%mutate(measure_type="1")%>%add_row(stay_at_home)%>%mutate(measure_type=as.numeric(measure_type))





```

```{r}
data_long<-gather(neu, date, value, '2020-03-08':'2020-07-04')
#data_long1<-reshape(data_long, v.names="value", timevar="measure_type", idvar=c("stateID_new", "date"), direction="wide")
data_long1<-spread(data_long, measure_type, value)
names(data_long1)=c("stateID_new", "date", "value", "stay_at_home")
```


```{r}



#data_long<-data_long%>%mutate(dateID=as.numeric(date))

range(data_long1$date, na.rm = T)

data_long1$day_year <- strftime(data_long1$date, format = "%j")


data_long1<-data_long1%>%
   group_by(stateID_new)%>%
  mutate(value_cumu=cumsum(value))%>%
  mutate(stay_at_home_cumu=cumsum(stay_at_home))

names(data_long1)=c("bula","date_measure","measure_day", "stay_at_home_day", "day_year", 
                  "measure_cumu", "stay_at_home_cumu")

```

get <- c("hid", "pid", "syear","tranche", "ptagin","pmonin", "ple0008", "plh0171", 
            "plh0172", "plh0184", "plh0185", "plh0186", "plh0187", 
            "plj0587", "plj0588", "plj0589",
            "plh0339", "plh0340", 
            "plh0341", "plh0342", "plh0035", "plh0182", "pgcasmin", "pgisced11","pskinder", "pkkinder", "bula", "hlc0005_h", "gebjahr", "sex", "ple0010_h", "pla0009_v2", "plb0022_h"
            )
sd<-c("edu", "edu_lmh", "kinderS", "kinderK", "bula", "einkommen", "gebjahr", "sex", "gjahr_h", "geschlecht", "erwerbstaetig")


health_vars <- c("srh", "sat_hlt", 
                 "sat_slp", "angr", "anx", "hpy", "sad", 
                 "lone1", "lone2", "lone3", "phq1", "phq2", "phq3", "phq4", 
                 "wry_hlt", "lifesat")





rechnen <- select(data, all_of(get))
names(rechnen) <- c("hid", "pid", "syear","tranche", "tag", "monat", health_vars, sd)

rechnen <- mutate_at(rechnen, vars(c("hid", "pid", "syear","tranche", "tag", "monat", all_of(health_vars), all_of(sd))),
                  list(~ ifelse( . %in% c(-8:-1), NA, .)))

recode.scale <- function(x, na.rm = TRUE) (max(x, na.rm = T) - (x-1)) 

rechnen <- mutate_at(rechnen, vars(angr, anx, sad, lone1, lone2, lone3,
                          wry_hlt),
                  .funs = list("r"=~recode.scale(.)))


# %>% mutate(edu_cat = cut(edu, breaks = c(0,3, 7, 9)))

rechnen <- rechnen %>% mutate(depr = phq1 + phq2-2) %>% mutate(gad=phq3+phq4-2) %>% mutate(phq=phq1 + phq2+phq3+phq4-4)%>% mutate(wlb = rowSums(cbind(angr_r + anx_r + hpy + sad_r), na.rm = F)) %>%mutate(lone = rowSums(cbind(lone1_r + lone2_r + lone3_r)-3, na.rm = F))
rechnen<-rechnen%>%mutate(depr_cat=if_else(depr>=3,1,0,NA_real_))%>%mutate(gad_cat=if_else(gad>=3,1,0,NA_real_))%>%mutate(phq_cat=if_else(phq>=5,1,0,NA_real_))%>%mutate(phq_sev=cut(phq, breaks = c(0,2,5,8,12)))%>% mutate(edu_cat = cut(edu, breaks = c(0,3, 7, 9))) %>% mutate(lon_cat  = if_else(lone >= 6, 1, 0, NA_real_))%>%mutate(alter_2020=2020-gjahr_h)


health_2019<-c("depr", "gad", "phq", "depr_cat", "gad_cat", "phq_cat", "wlb", "lone", "lon_cat", "edu_lmh")

rechnen$pdatt2 <- ifelse(rechnen$tag < 10, str_c(0, data$ptagin), data$ptagin)
rechnen$pdatm2 <- ifelse(rechnen$monat < 10, str_c(0, data$pmonin), data$pmonin)
rechnen$date <- str_c(rechnen$pdatm2, rechnen$pdatt2, rechnen$syear)
rechnen$date <- as.Date(rechnen$date, format = "%m %d %y")
range(rechnen$date, na.rm = T)

rechnen$week <- strftime(rechnen$date, format = "%V")
rechnen$day_year <- strftime(rechnen$date, format = "%j")
range(rechnen$week,na.rm = T)
range(rechnen$day_year,na.rm = T)

#data_re<-reshape(data=data1, v.names=c(""), timevar="syear", idvar="pid", direction=wide)


data2020<-filter(rechnen, syear==2020)
data2019<-filter(rechnen, syear==2019)

data2019<-select(data2019,pid, syear,all_of(health_2019) )

rechnen_final<-merge(data2020, data2019, by="pid", suffixes = c(".2020",".2019"))

rechnen_final <- rechnen_final %>%mutate(bula_stay=case_when(
                                                   (bula == 1) ~ 0,#schleswig

                                                   (bula == 11) ~ 1,#berl

                                                   (bula == 13) ~ 0,#MV
                                                   (bula == 14) ~ 1,#sachsen
                                                   (bula == 15) ~ 1,#SachsenAnhal
                                                   (bula == 16) ~ 0))#thü
rechnen_final <- rechnen_final %>%mutate(bula_stay=factor(bula_stay, labels=c("none", "order"), exclude = NA_real_))%>% mutate(week=as.numeric(week))


rechnen_final_measure<-merge(rechnen_final, data_long1, by=c("bula", "day_year"))

rechnen_final_measure<-rechnen_final_measure%>%mutate(phq_anstieg=phq.2020-phq.2019)%>%mutate(geschlecht_r=if_else(geschlecht==2, 1, 0, NA_real_))%>%mutate(geschlecht_r=factor(geschlecht, labels=c("male", "female")))%>%mutate(education.2019=factor(edu_lmh.2019, labels=c("primary education", "lower secondary education", "upper secondary education","post-secondary non-tertiary education", "short-cycle tertiary education", "Bachelor or equivalent", "Master or equivalent", "Doctorial or equivalent", exclude=NA)))%>%mutate(kinder=if_else(kinderS==1 |kinderK==1, 1, 0,NA_real_))%>%mutate(living_with_children=factor(kinder,labels=c("no", "yes"),exclude=NA))%>%mutate(erwerbstaetig_neu=if_else(erwerbstaetig==9, 0, 1,NA_real_))%>%mutate(erwerbstaetig_neu=factor(erwerbstaetig_neu,labels=c("no", "yes"),exclude=NA))%>%mutate(edu_cat.2019=case_when(
